title: Dreilinden
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, European, Swiss, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A typical Swiss restaurant except that it also offers several vegan entrees and mains (around 6, as of Jun 2015). The kitchen uses seasonal and local products, fresh and wild herbs. Dine with view over the city of Sankt Gallen. Prices are comparable consider moderate by local dining standard but slightly expensive for travelers.
